title: Virgil's Bucolicks Engished [sic]. VVhereunto is added the translation of the two first satyrs of Iuvenal. By Iohn Bidle
author: Virgil.
notes: "A satyrical essay, or the tvvo first satyrs of Iuvenal Englished" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
